attributes.action: Call for a national referendum on the implementation of Digital ID.
attributes.additional_details: With this vote, the government can properly lay out and explain how digital ID will impact each and everyone’s lives . It will also allow opposition to digital ID to state their case against it. Thus the general public can make an informed decision one way or the other.
attributes.background: Allow the general public to vote on a system that could impact their future rights of freedom.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
